column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////My significant other and I have decided to start coming here atleast once a week. This week we took my mother and she loved it as much as we did. My first trip I ordered the spicy chicken ramen and the second time I got the same thing except with spicy pork. My s/o refuses to order anything except the goku because of their tender brisket. Amazingly
column2: It literally fell apart when he picked it up with the chop sticks. I'm hesitant in trying new things but this was definitely a fun experience.
